data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bukejs, Andris, Biondi, Maurizio, Alekseev, Vitalii I. (2016): New records and species of Crepidodera Chevrolat (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae) in Eocene European amber, with a brief review of described fossil beetles from Bitterfeld amber. Zootaxa 4193 (2): 390-400, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4193.2.13|3 occurrences
